name: Farro and Watermelon Salad
description: If the farro is already cooked, this recipe takes all of 5 minutes to put together. Other grains, like quinoa or even rice, can be substituted.
recipeIngredient: 4 cups cooked and cooled farro (or wheat berries)
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl combine 3 cups cubed watermelon, 4 cups cooked and cooled farro (or wheat berries), 1 small red onion, 1/3 cup crumbled ricotta salata and chopped fresh parsley. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, sprinkle with salt and pepper, toss, and serve.
